QuestData.Title: Lord of the Shado-Pan
QuestData.Description: Our lord, Taran Zhu, has been overcome by a sha of pure hatred. The whole monastery has been lost!$B$B$C, you must find a way to free him of this possession. Last I knew, he was meditating in the Grove of Falling Blossoms.
QuestData.PortraitGiverName: Taran Zhu, Lord of the Shado-Pan
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Free him from the grip of the Sha of Hatred!
QuestData.LogDescription: Rid Taran Zhu of his possession by the Sha of Hatred.
